title: Issues Filtering, Labeling Videos, and Learning

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
OS: OS X 10.15.4
DeepLabCut Version: 2.2b5
Anaconda env used: DLC-CPU

**Describe the problem**

I am having issues running multiple commands with the new MA Deeplabcut. 
After training and then refining a video with refine_tracklets to create an .h5 file I ran a few subsequent commands to filter the data, create a labeled video, as well as refine the network.

When I run
`deeplabcut.filterpredictions(config_path,['/Users/Ben/Desktop/DLC_Tracking_2/Multi_Vids-Ben-2020-06-03/videos/N_LLine_A_1_Trimmed.mp4'])`
it returns
`No unfiltered data file found in /Users/Ben/Desktop/DLC_Tracking_2/Multi_Vids-Ben-2020-06-03/videos for video N_LLine_A_1_Trimmed and scorer DLC_resnet50_Multi_VidsJun3shuffle1_3000.` 

When I run
`deeplabcut.create_labeled_video(config_path, ['/Users/Ben/Desktop/DLC_Tracking_2/Multi_Vids-Ben-2020-06-03/videos/N_LLine_A_1_Trimmed.mp4'],track_method='skeleton', draw_skeleton = True)`
It creates the video with labeled points, however the points are the original ones, and not the refined ones that I fixed with refine_tracklets. 
It also returns
`No unfiltered data file found in /Users/Ben/Desktop/DLC_Tracking_2/Multi_Vids-Ben-2020-06-03/videos for video N_LLine_A_1_Trimmed and scorer DLC_resnet50_Multi_VidsJun3shuffle1_3000.`
If the track method is not skeleton. 

When I run
`deeplabcut.extract_outlier_frames(config_path,['/Users/Ben/Desktop/DLC_Tracking_2/Multi_Vids-Ben-2020-06-03/videos/N_LLine_A_1_Trimmed.mp4'])`
it returns
`It seems the video has not been analyzed yet, or the video is not found! You can only refine the labels after the a video is analyzed. Please run 'analyze_video' first. Or, please double check your video file path`
The video has already been analyzed and does exist.

Finally, running
`deeplabcut.refine_labels(config_path)`
Does open up a dialog, however there is not a machinelabels.h5 file in the labeled-data folder. 

I am still getting used to MA Deeplabcut, and was wondering if these are working as expected currently. I am hoping to be able to retrain the network with my refined videos. If there is a way to do that with the current setup I would appreciate knowing. Thank you for your work.
